tool_description: The API shows UFC event results
name: UFCevents API
title: UFCevents API

api_list.name: UFC_200
api_list.description: This will show the UFC 200 event details
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ufcevents-api.p.rapidapi.com/UFC_200"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufcevents-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ufcevents-api.p.rapidapi.com/{event_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ufcevents-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
